values.name: 2050 - 1 Foot Rise
values.help: NJDEP 2012 tidal marsh extent and Sea Level Affecting Marsh Model (SLAMM) results predicting the vulnerability of tidal marsh conversion to mudflat or open water; and impeded and unimpeded marsh retreat zones under 3 sea level rise scenarios.
